game.name: DCS: Iraq North
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: Dive into the rugged terrains and historically significant regions of Northern Iraq. This module offers a richly detailed environment featuring the mountainous landscapes, rivers, and urban centres that have been central to numerous military operations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the rugged terrains and historically significant regions of Northern Iraq. This module offers a richly detailed environment featuring the mountainous landscapes, rivers, and urban centres that have been central to numerous military operations.
